channel.title: Yoyos on Writing by Harper Reed
channel.description: Recent content in Yoyos on Writing by Harper Reed

item.title: goddamn
item.description: i just found out I lost my yoyos in the mail. one hundred dollars worth of yoyos gone. woe is me…. woooooooooooe is meeeeeee.. i am so sad. I need new string so bad it isn’t even funny. I think I am on my last string.. doh :( :`(
